title: An apologie or defence of the watch-vvord, against the virulent and seditious ward-vvord published by an English-Spaniard, lurking vnder the title of N.D. Devided into eight seuerall resistances according to his so many encounters, written by Sir Francis Hastings Knight
author: Hastings, Francis, Sir, d. 1610.
publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Ralph Iacson,
notes: Some pages repeated or missing in number only.
A response to STC 19415: Parsons, Robert.  A temperate ward-ward, to the turbulent and seditious wach-word of Sir Francis Hastinges knight. Answered by STC 19418.
Imperfect; leaf Y4 torn with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
